home.title: Deep Resirch
home.researchAssistantReady: Your AI research assistant is ready to help

guestPopup.content:
Given the international setbacks for our rights and the increasing violence, we have created an Deep Resirch for the entire community and our friends and families. Our goal is to unite our forces for greater protection and strengthening of the community. Everyone can participate and contribute according to their time and interest.

Our goal is to connect citizens, activists and organizations better, present existing services more transparently, to create new services, and to advocate politically for our rights.

It's time to act! If not us, who? If not now, when?

home.subtitle: You're already part of the Deep Resirch! Access your dashboard to continue your journey.
home.guestSubtitle: Register to become part of our community
home.metaTitle: Deep Resirch - Join Our Deep Resirch

profileExplainer.title: Great that you followed the Rainbow Rabbit.
profileExplainer.content:
Heroes like you are needed now.

As our rights are in danger worldwide, it's time for us to unite. With the Deep Resirch, we want to provide more communication, information and networking within the community, support each other in existing projects, but also start new projects together. We want to move from talking to action.

Ideas range from supporting Bratislava Pride, a community info day to a large email distribution list for petitions, actions and demonstrations. You can also contribute new ideas and wishes. We then support each other in implementation.

Want to stay informed or participate?

Currently you can participate with four different roles:

  1. as a supporter and newsletter subscriber
  2. as an activist for individual actions
  3. as an expert for specialist questions
  4. and as a member for active collaboration and monthly meetings.

If you want to know more, fill out your profile information and we'll contact you after Pride month.

No time but want to donate?

All our services are free.

But we must not become dependent on state funding or corporate sponsorship.

That's why the community should finance itself in the medium term.

introduction.title: Privacy Policy
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Deep Resirch ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our platform and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the trust you place in us as you engage with our community platform.
introduction.keyPoints:
Key Privacy Features:
• Complete control: Delete your entire account and all data instantly from your profile settings
• Granular consent: Choose exactly what communications you receive
• Data transparency: Clear explanations of what data we collect and why
• EU protection: Hosted in the EU with full GDPR compliance and Austrian data protection law adherence
• No data sales: We never sell your personal information to third parties

controllerInfo.title: 1. Data Controller Information
controllerInfo.content: We are the data controller responsible for your personal information. You can contact us regarding any privacy matters at:

legalBasis.title: 2. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds under GDPR Article 6:
legalBasis.consent: • Your consent: For newsletter subscriptions and direct communication only
legalBasis.contract: • Contractual necessity: To provide our platform services and facilitate community connections
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: • Legitimate interests: To operate and improve our platform, ensure community safety, and facilitate meaningful connections within the community. Our legitimate interest is balanced against your privacy rights.
legalBasis.legalObligation: • Legal obligation: To comply with applicable laws and regulations
legalBasis.vitalInterests: • Vital interests: In rare cases to protect someone's life or physical safety

profileData.title: Profile Information (What & Why)
profileData.content:
• Email address (required): Account creation, authentication, critical communications, password reset
• Username: Unique identifier for community interactions and profile display
• Name (first/last, optional): Personalized greetings, community recognition, networking facilitation
• Phone number (optional): Emergency contact, two-factor authentication, premium support
• Bio and website (optional): Community networking, skill showcasing, professional connections
• Skills and abilities: Matching with relevant opportunities, project collaboration, expertise identification
• Professional information: Career networking, expertise validation, collaboration opportunities
• Participation preferences: Role matching (member, expert, activist, supporter), event recommendations
• Location (country/state/city): Local event notifications, regional community building, legal compliance
• Communication preferences: Respecting consent choices, personalized communication frequency

usageData.title: Technical Data (Security & Functionality Only)
usageData.content:
• IP address: Security monitoring, fraud prevention, compliance with regional laws
• Browser/device information: Compatibility optimization, security verification, responsive design
• Session data: Authentication state, login security, automatic logout for protection
• Error logs: Technical issue resolution, platform stability monitoring, bug fixes
• Note: We do not track personal activity patterns, page visits, or interaction data

paymentData.title: Payment Information (What & How)
paymentData.content:
• Transaction records: Donation history, subscription status, billing reconciliation
• Payment metadata: Transaction IDs, amounts, currency, dates for financial reporting
• Stripe integration: Payment processing handled by Stripe with PCI DSS compliance
• Billing addresses: Tax calculation, fraud prevention, regulatory compliance
• Subscription details: Service level management, renewal processing, usage tracking
• Note: We never store credit card numbers, CVV codes, or sensitive payment data

consentData.title: Consent Data (Your Communication Preferences)
consentData.content:
• Direct contact: Consent to being contacted with opportunities inside of the Deep Resirch
• Newsletter: Consent to receiving newsletters and information (not marketing)
• Organizational representative: Consent to being contacted as a representative of an organization directly
• Consent history: Timestamps and changes to your preferences (GDPR compliance)

purposes.title: 4. How We Use Your Information (Detailed Purposes)
purposes.community: • Community building: Skill-based member matching, local event recommendations, mentorship connections, collaboration opportunities based on shared interests and location
purposes.personalization: • Personalized experience: Content curation based on participation roles, event suggestions matching your skills, language-specific communications, timezone-appropriate notifications
purposes.communication: • Communication: Newsletter delivery (consent-based), direct contact with opportunities (consent-based), organizational representative contact (consent-based), platform updates, security notifications
purposes.platform: • Platform operation: User authentication, session management, feature functionality, data synchronization, multi-language support, mobile responsiveness
purposes.safety: • Community safety: Fraud detection through IP monitoring, spam prevention via rate limiting, abuse reporting systems, content moderation, account verification
purposes.analytics: • Website Analytics: Anonymized website statistics from Vercel Analytics (no personal data collected, completely cookie-free)
purposes.legal: • Legal compliance: Austrian data protection law adherence, GDPR requirement fulfillment, audit trail maintenance, regulatory reporting when required
purposes.technical: • Technical functionality: Database optimization, backup creation, system monitoring, security patch deployment, performance optimization, error tracking and resolution

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We take your privacy seriously and only share information in these specific circumstances:
sharing.serviceProviders: • Service providers: Trusted partners who help us operate our platform (e.g., Supabase for data hosting, Stripe for payments, Vercel for analytics)
sharing.legal: • Legal requirements: When required by law, court order, or to protect our legal rights
sharing.consent: • With your consent: Any other sharing only occurs with your explicit permission
sharing.noSharing: • No member sharing: We do not share your information with other Deep Resirch members or users
sharing.noSale: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

dataTransfers.title: 6. International Data Transfers
dataTransfers.content: Some of our service providers may be located outside the European Economic Area (EEA). When we transfer your data internationally, we ensure adequate protection through:
dataTransfers.adequacy: • Adequacy decisions: Transfers to countries with adequate data protection
dataTransfers.safeguards: • Appropriate safeguards: Standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission
dataTransfers.providers: • Our current providers include Supabase (EU infrastructure), Stripe (global with EU safeguards), and Vercel (EU hosting in Frankfurt region)

retention.title: 7. Data Retention and Deletion
retention.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary and provide immediate deletion capabilities:
retention.active: • Active accounts: Data retained while your account remains active and you continue using our services
retention.dormant: • Dormant accounts: Automatic deletion after 3 years of complete inactivity (with 90-day advance warning via email)
retention.immediate: • Immediate self-deletion: Delete your entire account instantly via Profile Settings → Account Settings → Delete Account
retention.deletion: • Upon deletion request: Immediate removal from all active systems, databases, and authentication services
retention.backups: • Backup removal: Complete removal from all backup systems within 90 days of account deletion
retention.legal: • Legal requirements: Limited data retention only where specifically required by Austrian or EU law (e.g., financial records for tax purposes)
retention.technical: • Technical deletion process: Profile data deleted from main database → Authentication credentials removed → Audit logs marked for deletion → Backup systems purged
retention.confirmation: • Deletion confirmation: Automatic logout and email confirmation sent after successful account deletion

rights.title: 8. Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights.access: • Right of access: Request a copy of your personal data via admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com or view directly in your profile settings
rights.rectification: • Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate data directly in your profile settings or request assistance via admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
rights.erasure: • Right to erasure: Delete your entire account instantly from your profile settings (Settings > Account Settings > Delete Account) or request deletion via admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
rights.restriction: • Right to restriction: Limit how we process your data by contacting admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
rights.portability: • Right to data portability: Receive your data in structured JSON format via admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
rights.objection: • Right to object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests via admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
rights.withdrawal: • Withdraw consent: Modify consent preferences directly in your profile settings or contact admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
rights.complaint: • Right to complain: Lodge a complaint with the Austrian Data Protection Authority (Datenschutzbehörde) at dsb.gv.at
rights.exercise: Most rights can be exercised directly in your profile settings. For additional assistance, contact admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com (30-day response guarantee).

accountDeletion.title: 8.1. Complete Account Deletion (Self-Service)
accountDeletion.content: You can delete your entire account and all associated data at any time directly from your profile settings:
accountDeletion.access: • How to access: Sign in → Profile → Settings → Account Settings → Delete Account
accountDeletion.process: • Deletion process: Type 'DELETE' to confirm → Immediate permanent deletion of all data
accountDeletion.scope: • What gets deleted: All profile information, skills, preferences, consent history, audit logs, session data, and authentication credentials
accountDeletion.immediate: • Timing: Immediate deletion from all systems, including database and authentication
accountDeletion.irreversible: • Important: This action is irreversible - once deleted, your account and data cannot be recovered
accountDeletion.backup: • Backup removal: Your data is removed from all backups within 90 days of deletion
accountDeletion.confirmation: • Confirmation: You will be automatically logged out and redirected after successful deletion
accountDeletion.alternative: • Alternative: Contact admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com if you need assistance with account deletion

security.title: 9. Comprehensive Data Security Measures
security.content: We implement multiple layers of robust security measures to protect your personal information:

technical.title: Technical Security Measures
technical.content:
• Data encryption: All data encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256) via Supabase
• Database security: Row Level Security (RLS) policies ensuring users can only access their own data
• Authentication: Multi-factor authentication support, secure session management with automatic expiry
• Input validation: Comprehensive XSS prevention, SQL injection protection, input sanitization
• Security headers: Content Security Policy (CSP), HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS), anti-clickjacking protection
• API security: Rate limiting, request validation, secure API endpoints with authentication required

organizational.title: Organizational Security Measures
organizational.content:
• Access controls: Principle of least privilege, role-based access to systems and data
• Staff training: Regular security awareness training, data protection protocols
• Data processing agreements: Comprehensive agreements with all third-party processors
• Incident response plan: Documented procedures for security breach detection and response
• Regular audits: Quarterly security reviews, annual penetration testing, vulnerability assessments

monitoring.title: Continuous Security Monitoring
monitoring.content:
• Real-time monitoring: 24/7 system monitoring, automated threat detection
• Audit trails: Comprehensive logging of all profile changes, login attempts, data access
• Session tracking: Active session monitoring, automatic logout after inactivity
• Fraud prevention: IP-based anomaly detection, suspicious activity alerts
• Error tracking: Automated error logging and response for security-related issues

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Security
infrastructure.content:
• Hosting security: EU-based Supabase infrastructure with SOC 2 Type II compliance
• Network security: Firewalls, VPN access for administrators, secure communication channels
• Backup security: Encrypted automatic backups, secure backup storage, tested recovery procedures
• Update management: Automated security patches, regular dependency updates, vulnerability scanning
• Compliance: GDPR compliance, Austrian data protection law adherence, regular compliance audits

incident.title: Data Breach Response
incident.content:
• Detection: Automated monitoring systems, immediate alerts for suspicious activity
• Response: 72-hour breach notification to Austrian Data Protection Authority when required
• User notification: Direct communication to affected users within 72 hours of confirmed breach
• Mitigation: Immediate containment procedures, security patch deployment, system hardening
• Documentation: Complete incident documentation, post-incident security improvements

cookies.title: 10. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use only essential cookies - no tracking, analytics, or marketing cookies. For detailed information, please see our Cookie Policy. Key points:
cookies.essential: • Essential cookies only: Required for login, payments, and language support (no consent needed)
cookies.analytics: • No analytics cookies: We use Vercel's cookie-free analytics instead
cookies.preference: • Preferences stored in your account: Language, theme, and settings saved to your database profile, not cookies
cookies.marketing: • No marketing cookies: We don't use advertising or behavioral tracking cookies

minors.title: 11. Protection of Minors
minors.content: Our platform is designed for individuals 18 years and older. Users under 18 are not permitted to create accounts or use our services.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will:
changes.notification: • Notify users: Email notification for significant changes
changes.consent: • Obtain consent: For material changes affecting your rights
changes.posting: • Post updates: Always maintain the current version on our website
changes.date: • Update date: The "Last updated" date shows the most recent revision

contact.title: 13. Contact Information
contact.content: For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us:
contact.details:
Email: admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com
Response time: Within 30 days
Data Protection Authority: Österreichische Datenschutzbehörde (dsb.gv.at)

introduction.title: Cookie Policy
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how QUEER MEDIA LITERACY e.V. ("Deep Resirch") uses cookies on our platform. We use only essential cookies that are necessary for our platform to function - no tracking, advertising, or analytics cookies that require your consent.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. We only use essential cookies that are necessary for our platform to function:
whatAreCookies.remembering: • Secure login sessions - Keep you logged in safely
whatAreCookies.improving: • Multi-language support - Remember your language choice for navigation
whatAreCookies.personalizing: • No tracking - We don't use cookies to track your behavior

essential.title: Essential Cookies (The Only Cookies We Use)
essential.content: All our cookies are essential - they're required for the platform to work and don't require your consent under GDPR:
essential.authentication: • Login Security: Session tokens to keep you securely logged in
essential.security: • Payment Protection: Stripe fraud prevention during donations
essential.functionality: • Language Support: Remember your language choice for site navigation
essential.compliance: • No Tracking: We don't use cookies to collect personal data or track behavior

functional.title: User Preferences (Stored in Your Account, Not Cookies)
functional.content: Privacy by design: We store your preferences in your secure account profile, not in tracking cookies:
functional.preferences: • Language & Theme: Saved to your account profile, accessible across devices
functional.formData: • Accessibility Settings: Stored securely in your database profile
functional.accessibility: • Better Privacy: Account-based storage means no tracking cookies needed

analytics.title: Analytics (Completely Cookie-Free)
analytics.content: We use Vercel Web Analytics - a privacy-first solution that uses zero cookies:
analytics.usage: • No Cookies: Uses anonymous hash-based visitor identification
analytics.performance: • Privacy First: Hash resets every 24 hours, no cross-site tracking
analytics.demographics: • Anonymous Only: Aggregated statistics, no personal data
analytics.provider: • No Consent Needed: Compliant by design, no cookies means no consent required

payment.title: Payment Processing Cookies (Essential for Payments)
payment.content: Stripe payment processor uses essential cookies during payment processing:
payment.security: • Payment security: Essential for secure transaction processing
payment.session: • Session management: Maintain payment state during checkout process

thirdPartyServices.title: 3. Third-Party Services and Their Cookies
thirdPartyServices.content: We work with GDPR-compliant partners who may set cookies when you use their services:

stripe.title: Stripe (Payment Processing)
stripe.purpose: Secure payment processing for donations and memberships
stripe.privacy: Privacy Policy: stripe.com/privacy | Cookie Policy: stripe.com/legal/cookies-policy
stripe.legal: Used only during payment processing (legitimate interest for contract performance)

vercel.title: Vercel Analytics (Website Analytics)
vercel.purpose: Privacy-focused website analytics and performance monitoring
vercel.cookies: No cookies used - hash-based anonymous visitor identification
vercel.legal: No consent required as no personal data or cookies are used

supabase.title: Supabase (Authentication & Database)
supabase.purpose: Secure user authentication and data storage
supabase.cookies: Session cookies for authentication (essential for login functionality)
supabase.legal: Essential cookies for contract performance (no consent required)

cookieConsent.title: 4. Why We Don't Need Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.content: No consent required - all our cookies are essential for functionality:
cookieConsent.essential: • Essential Only: All cookies necessary for login, payments, and navigation
cookieConsent.granular: • No Tracking: We don't use advertising, analytics, or behavioral cookies
cookieConsent.withdraw: • GDPR Compliant: Essential cookies are exempt from consent requirements
cookieConsent.settings: • Privacy by Design: Minimal data collection, maximum user privacy
cookieConsent.noConsent: • Transparent: We tell you exactly what we use and why

browserControls.title: 5. Browser Cookie Controls
browserControls.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may prevent login and payment functionality:
browserControls.chrome: • Chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and other site data
browserControls.firefox: • Firefox: Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browserControls.safari: • Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Cookies and website data
browserControls.edge: • Edge: Settings > Site permissions > Cookies and site data
browserControls.impact: Important: Disabling essential cookies will prevent login, payments, and core functionality

cookieDetails.title: 6. Detailed Cookie List
cookieDetails.content: Complete list of cookies that may be set on your device:

items.name: sb-[project]-auth-token
items.legal: Contract performance (essential for user account access)

functional.title: Functional Cookies (Currently None)
functional.content: We do NOT use functional cookies. User preferences are stored securely in your database profile instead of cookies, providing better privacy and persistence across devices.

analytics.title: Analytics (No Cookies)
analytics.content: Vercel Web Analytics uses privacy-friendly, cookie-free analytics that do not require consent under GDPR.

legalBasis.title: 7. Legal Basis for Cookie Processing
legalBasis.content: Our cookie usage complies with GDPR Article 6 and ePrivacy Directive Article 5(3):
legalBasis.essential: • Essential cookies: Legitimate interest (Article 6(1)(f)) for platform functionality and security
legalBasis.payment: • Payment cookies: Contract performance (Article 6(1)(b)) for processing transactions
legalBasis.consent: • Functional cookies: Consent (Article 6(1)(a)) for enhanced user experience
legalBasis.compliance: • Consent cookies: Legal obligation (Article 6(1)(c)) for GDPR compliance record-keeping
legalBasis.analytics: • Analytics: No legal basis required (no cookies or personal data processed)

dataProtection.title: 8. Data Protection and Cookie Rights
dataProtection.content: Your cookie-related data protection rights under GDPR:
dataProtection.access: • Right of access: Request information about cookies set on your device
dataProtection.rectification: • Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate cookie preference records
dataProtection.erasure: • Right to erasure: Delete cookie consent records (contact admin@queer-Deep Resirch.com)
dataProtection.restriction: • Right to restriction: Limit cookie processing to essential only
dataProtection.objection: • Right to object: Object to non-essential cookies (withdraw consent)
dataProtection.portability: • Data portability: Receive your cookie consent history in structured format

updates.title: 9. Updates to This Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy to reflect legal or technical changes:
updates.notification: • Notification: Email notification for material changes affecting your rights
updates.consent: • New consent: Request updated consent for new cookie types or purposes
updates.effective: • Effective date: Changes take effect 30 days after notification unless urgent
updates.version: • Version control: Previous versions available upon request

contact.title: 10. Contact Us About Cookies
contact.content: For questions about our cookie practices or to exercise your rights:
contact.response: Response within 30 days as required by GDPR Article 12
contact.address: QUEER MEDIA LITERACY e.V., 1060 Wien, Mariahilfer Straße 49/15, Austria

why.title: Why we came together?
why.content: We live in a time, where well-organized and well-resourced forces pit people against each other. Their goal is clear: to attack the fundamental rights of queer people and prevent equal rights from being granted. Our Deep Resirch is a response to these anti-democratic and inhumane efforts. We will not be pushed back, divided, confused, or oppressed, and we move forward with determination.

who.title: Who are we?
who.content: We are an Deep Resirch of queer people and their allies who work together to strengthen and protect the LGBTQIA+ community. We see ourselves as a network for solidarity that pools collective forces and promotes the interests of its members. We create creative spaces for ideas and the design of an open and diverse society.

what.title: What drives us?
what.content: We defend our right to safety, to visibility, and to love against any hostility. No one has the right to decide about our being. We take our future into our own hands, without others determining it.

participation.title: Who can join us?
participation.content: Our Deep Resirch is open to all members of the LGBTQIA+ community and their allies, regardless of origin, affiliation, and way of life. Where others divide and exclude, we live strength through diversity.

action.title: How do we act?
action.content: We stand up for each other, internally and externally. We do not stand by idly, we act. We are part of the Deep Resirch for freedom, diversity, and self-determination.

partners.title: Partners
partners.partnersList: Until the spin-off of the Deep Resirch, the Queer Media Literacy association will assume liability for the website. However, the association is just one partner among many. Vangardist Agency & Magazine, GGG.at, Transv.at, Queer Moments, Queer Dance im Gemeindebau, Porn Film Festival Vienna, Queer Shorts Vienna, Vienna Gay Men's Chorus, YK Media

registration.title: Registration
registration.authority: Authority: Vienna State Police Directorate, Department for Association, Assembly and Media Law Affairs

contact.title: Contact
contact.note: For all inquiries, please use exclusively the email address provided above.

responsible.title: Responsible for Content
responsible.content: The association QUEER MEDIA LITERACY e.V. is responsible for all content on this website.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer

descriptions.1: Leading queer media agency and magazine
descriptions.3: Exchange, education, counseling and more for trans topics
descriptions.4: We organize queer art projects, fostering visibility and discourse by putting artists in the spotlight
descriptions.5: We dance from Gemeindebau to Gemeindebau for tolerance, respect, and diversity
descriptions.6: Film Festival for porn and queer topics
descriptions.7: The first international queer short film festival in Vienna
descriptions.8: A performing arts institution with the mission of becoming a voice in the LGBTQIA+ community
